analyzed: ▁dhamma pacc anīy ānulom a ▁tik aduk apaṭṭhānapāḷi

original: Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo hetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: ▁na upādinn upādān iyaṃ ▁nahetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁a nupādinnupādāniy o ▁hetu ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha …pe… āsevane
Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: ▁na upādinn upādān iyaṃ ▁nan ahetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁a nupādinnupādāniy o ▁nahetu ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekādasa …pe…
